context_analysis.energy_patterns: Energy level 7/10 indicates good capacity for focused work. Weekend context suggests more flexibility and lower stress.
strategic_priorities: Clean house before Hunter returns at 10pm

reasoning.scheduling_strategy: Front-load echo development work in the morning before golf (6am-9:30am) when energy is fresh. After golf, use afternoon for house tasks and meal planning. Evening available for additional echo work if energy permits. Build in buffer time for golf prep and travel.
reasoning.energy_optimization: Leverage morning hours for complex echo development when cognitive function peaks. Schedule physical tasks (cleaning) post-golf when already in active mode. Reserve lower-energy meal planning for later afternoon.
reasoning.priority_sequencing: 1) Echo dev early morning, 2) Golf commitment fixed at 11:10, 3) House cleaning in afternoon, 4) Meal planning and potential grocery run, 5) Optional evening echo work if time/energy allows
reasoning.recovery_planning: Golf provides natural break and physical activity. Post-golf lunch break for recovery. Evening wind-down after Hunter returns. Weekend pace allows for more relaxed transitions between activities.

schedule.title: Morning Routine & Coffee
schedule.note: Gentle weekend start, prep for productive morning

schedule.title: echo | MVP Development Sprint
schedule.note: Prime morning hours for echo project setup and core development. Goal: complete project setup for MVP

schedule.title: Golf Prep & Travel
schedule.note: Get ready, gather golf gear, drive to course (30 min)

schedule.title: Golf Warm-up
schedule.note: Arrive at course, check in, warm up at range

schedule.title: Golf with Jacob Smyle
schedule.note: 18 holes, social time, physical activity break

schedule.title: Lunch & Recovery
schedule.note: Post-golf meal and rest, transition back home

schedule.title: personal | House Cleaning
schedule.note: Focus on office tidying and bathroom cleaning for Hunter's return

schedule.title: personal | Meal Planning
schedule.note: Plan meals for the week, create shopping list

schedule.title: personal | Grocery Shopping
schedule.note: Optional grocery run if time and energy allow

schedule.title: echo | Evening Development Session
schedule.note: Optional continuation of echo work if energy permits, or relaxation time

schedule.title: Hunter Welcome & Wind Down
schedule.note: Be ready for Hunter's 10pm arrival, evening routine

key_insights: 3-hour morning sprint on echo before golf maximizes fresh energy for MVP progress
Golf provides natural midday break and social connection with Jacob
Afternoon scheduled for all home tasks ensures completion before Hunter's return
Optional evening echo session provides flexibility based on energy levels
Weekend schedule allows for relaxed pace while still achieving key objectives
